sn35.101:1.2: Taṃ vo pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn35.101:1.6: Taṃ vo pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn35.101:1.9: Te vo pahīnā hitāya sukhāya bhavissanti.
sn35.101:1.12: Taṃ vo pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn35.101:1.15: So vo pahīno hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn35.101:1.16: Yampidaṃ cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi na tumhākaṃ.
sn35.101:1.18: Taṃ vo pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn35.101:2.3: Sā vo pahīnā hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn35.101:2.6: Te vo pahīnā hitāya sukhāya bhavissanti.
sn35.101:2.9: Taṃ vo pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn35.101:2.12: So vo pahīno hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn35.101:2.13: Yampidaṃ jivhāsamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi na tumhākaṃ.
sn35.101:2.14: Taṃ pajahatha. Taṃ vo pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati …pe….
sn35.101:3.3: So vo pahīno hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn35.101:3.6: Te vo pahīnā hitāya sukhāya bhavissanti.
sn35.101:3.9: Taṃ vo pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn35.101:3.12: So vo pahīno hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn35.101:3.13: Yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi na tumhākaṃ.
sn35.101:3.15: Taṃ vo pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn35.101:4.1: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, yaṃ imasmiṃ jetavane tiṇakaṭṭhasākhāpalāsaṃ taṃ jano hareyya vā ḍaheyya vā yathāpaccayaṃ vā kareyya,
sn35.101:4.3: ‘amhe jano harati vā ḍahati vā yathāpaccayaṃ vā karotī’”ti?
sn35.101:7.1: “Na hi no etaṃ, bhante, attā vā attaniyaṃ vā”ti.
sn35.101:8.3: Taṃ vo pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn35.101:8.7: yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi na tumhākaṃ.
sn35.101:8.9: Taṃ vo pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissatī”ti.
